description:
Provide the implementation similar to the Amazon EC2 API 

ec2-reset-snapshot-attribute

for making the volume based snapshot instances accessible only to the respective account holder.

http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/CommandLineReference/ApiReference-cmd-ResetSnapshotAttribute.html
title: Add support for EC2 API : ec2-reset-snapshot-attribute
